verses.name: Job 24:6
verses.text: They reap every one his corn in the field: and they gather the vintage of the wicked.

verses.name: Job 24:7
verses.text: They cause the naked to lodge without clothing, that they have no covering in the cold.

verses.name: Job 24:8
verses.text: They are wet with the showers of the mountains, and embrace the rock for want of a shelter.

verses.name: Job 24:9
verses.text: They pluck the fatherless from the breast, and take a pledge of the poor.

verses.name: Job 24:10
verses.text: They cause him to go naked without clothing, and they take away the sheaf from the hungry;

verses.name: Job 24:11
verses.text: Which make oil within their walls, and tread their winepresses, and suffer thirst.
